pages.text: By just using three base colors, (almost) every existing color can be created.

pages.title: Mixing Colors
pages.text: Mixing gemstone powder together was not very successful. But you have an other idea:$(br)The closeness to nature of your gemstones suggests that nature must be both the source and the answer!$(br)Quickly you make a few notes and $(l:general/colored_trees)out tumbled a recipe$(), which looks very promising.
